replies.bodyText: By testing, listByScope should be the right one as parsing id would fail if it is resource group id here.

timeline.bodyText: Could you add an update? I seems not finding code to get resourceId from lockId in LockImpl, which should be needed for update.

replies.bodyText: Updated using lockedResourceId() method instead of lockedResourceId field. Added lazy loading for lockedResourceId to handle if the lock resource is from the List operation.

timeline.message: use listByScope as listAtResourceLevel not work for resource group id

timeline.bodyText: Not exactly sure whether we should throw exception.

replies.bodyText: This can be used after a Get/List operation for lockedResourceId. It might be better not throwing here.
